resources.string: Please enter the number of the watch callback
The network is not available, please check network settings
Connection timed out, Please check your network status and try again!
Enter the verification code you received
Please enter your registered phone number
Are you sure to delete this e-fence?
Failed to delete the e-fence! Please retry!
Fence name conflicts! The name already exists!
The nickname is a combination of 2~10 digits and letters, please re-enter!
The password is a combination of 6~16 digits or letters. Please enter it again!
The two passwords you entered mismatch
permissions, to use functions of &appname; normally
Whether or not sign out the current &appname; account
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam eget ligula eu lectus lobortis condimentum.
When charging, the watch will keep power on, and Scheduled boot will not take effect.
Turn On The Timing Power Switch
Turn Off The Timing Power Switch
When power remained less than 10%, watch is disabled
Unable to use location and micro chat, can answer phone only
When power remained less than 10%, location and microChat cannot be used, only can answer phone.
After reporting lost, position will be automatically sent to APP once the watch is connected
Turn on reporting loss of watch
Strange calls will trigger a message to App, for parents to determine
There is no track data for this period
Input cannot be blank or space character
Fence name should not be more than 20 English letters
The original password entered not correctly
Password is composed of 6~16 digits or letters
Input the baby mobile phone number
The watch number has not been set, please remind the administrator to set
Registration failed, please check the network
Watch will call back, please pay attention to answer.
Please set your kid\'s phone number at first
Are you sure to delete it?
Are you sure to unbind to <font color=\"#11cbd7\">%1$s</font>
No permission to access a album
Please open the permission in Settings to allow &appname; access the camera
modify the class disable on watch
The watch call out the telephone
The watch triggers an SOS event
Watch took off from the wrist
Refuse to call up the strangers
Please open the permission in Settings to allow the &appname; to record audio
Please open the permission in Settings to allow &appname; access to photos, media, and files on the device
Are you sure to delete the alarm?
Please open the permission of getting the location information of this device in the &appname; Settings
After receiving the instructions, the watch will dial back the number you entered. Your voice will not be heard on the phone.
The &appname; will be upgraded to version v%s
Please open the relevant permissions of the &appname; notification in the Settings
Whether the official holiday is open to guard
Please open the permission in Settings to allow the &appname; to access the Contacts
No permission to access the Contacts
You are the super manager of the watch. Unbinding will delete all members in the contacts book and remove all data related to the watch. Please be careful.
The new password is the same as the original password, please re-enter!
Please open the positioning service in the Settings
Are you sure you want to call baby?
Click again to exit the application
The class disable is opened. If you need to make a call, please click the ok button to set it
Please enter the name of the task
At present, you only have view permission and can not participate in the like-collections process.
Note: each task can be completed only once a day
Go ahead and fulfill your promise. Don\'t let children wait~
After the baby confirms that the reward is received by watch terminal,\n a new round of praise can be performed
The name of the task cannot be empty
The name of the prize cannot be empty
Are you sure to cancel this like-collections program?
Please enter the goal number of likes
Are you sure to delete this like-collections program?
Are you sure to delete the number?
The class disable is opened. Please click the ok button to set up the one-way call
Not set up for class disable
The start time is not the same as the end time
The start time should be less than the end time
Are you sure to delete this Class-Disable time?
1. All calls (including one-way calls) will be rejected during the disabled period.
2. Chat can be received but will not be reminded.
The timer is not switched on
On time and off time cannot be less than 5 minutes
Please set up the alert type
Edit the name of the alarm clock
Please fill in the name of the alarm clock
Leave school in the morning not later than the afternoon Arrive at school time
The arrival time of the school is not later than the departure time
The departure time in the afternoon is not later than the late arrival home time
Please set up the school address
Choose the time to arrive school in the afternoon
Choose the time to leave school in the afternoon
Choose the time to arrive school in the morning
Choose the time to leave school in the morning
Modify the name of the contact
Are you sure to unbind the user to the device?
Are you sure to delete the contact?
After closing, there will be no ringing or vibrating alerts when the phone receives the message!
Your current app version is too low and needs to be upgraded
Your opinions and suggestions are our driving force!
<font color=\"#11cbd7\">%1$s</font> (<font color=\"#11cbd7\">%2$s</font>) want to apply to become <font color=\"#11cbd7\">%3$s</font> (<font color=\"#11cbd7\">%4$s</font>) guardian, do you agree?
You have successfully logged in. You need to bind your watch before you can use it
Put the watch\'s QR code into the scan box, which can automatically scan
Wait for the administrator to agree to your binding application
The binding number is a set of strings, please view in the watch
Your application has been sent. Please wait for confirmation
Can\'t get location information, the signal of the location of the watch is not good
The difference between start time and end time cannot be less than 5 minutes
%1$s On the watch %2$s Reject strange calls
%1$s On the watch %2$s Refuse to call up the strangers
%1$s %3$s %2$s Refuse to call up the strangers
%1$s On the watch %2$s Power Saving Mode
%1$s change the screen time to %2$ds on watch
%1$s change the timed power On to: %2$s
%1$s change the timed power Off to: %2$s
Your account is logged in on another phone
A verification code has been sent to
Failed to send verification code, please resend
Request verification code too many. Please try again tomorrow
Request verification code too often. Please try again later
SD card not available, please insert SD card
System Download Manager is disabled and needs to be manually opened
The data network is currently in use. This may incur additional costs. Continue?
Need to associate your mobile phone number for normal use
Are you sure to disassociate <font color=\"#11cbd7\">%s</font>?
You are currently using <font color=\"#11cbd7\">%s</font> login, after disassociation, you will log out.
Login failed, please check the network
This mobile number has been associated
Please via mobile number or original
Associate failed, please check the network
This %1$s account has been associated with other accounts. To link this number, please use %2$s login and unbind.
Click to unlock account associated third-party applications
The SOS counts has reached the upper limit!
The number of contacts has reached the upper limit!
The number of fences has reached the limit!
The number of class disable has reached the upper limit!
The number of alarm clocks has reached the limit!
You were released from binding with the baby
Birthday cannot be greater than current date
Are you sure to save the task?
The number of goal-likes can not be 0
The name is too long, please re-enter
Please wait, the watch is being dialed back...
The class disable is opened. If you need to track the watch, please click the ok button to set it
If you need to find the watch when Class-Disable turned on, please click the OK button to set it.
The class disable is opened. If you need to make a call, please click the ok button to set it
Can make emergency calls during Disable-Period
The watch can also call the administrator in addition to watching the time while the class is disabled.
When turned on, watch disable will take the initiative to avoid the statutory holidays
Morning guard time cannot be empty
Afternoon guard time cannot be empty
The latest arrival time cannot be empty
Statutory holiday guard cannot be empty
Please click on the edit in the upper right corner
The arrival time of the school is not later than the departure time
On/Off time cannot be the same
Please turn on permission to access the location in Settings
There is a new version update, whether to go to update?
Has been unbinded by the administrator
You haven\'t turned on camera permission, click OK to jump to system settings
You haven\'t turned on album permission, click OK to jump to system settings
You haven\'t turned on notification permission, click OK to jump to system settings
You haven\'t turned on microphone permission, click OK to jump to system settings
The QR code is written locally success
The QR code is written locally failed
The administrator has agreed on you binding device
The network is not available, please check the network settings
Poor network signal, please wait or change network

1. All calls (including one-way calls) will be rejected during the disabled period.
2. Chat can be received but will not be reminded.
3. SOS function is normal.
4. Normal positioning.
The end time must be later than the start time
Are you sure to delete fence?
With 10% remaining power, positioning and chat cannot be used, only calls can be answered
Google Map won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your devices.
Please switch to "China Mainland" in "App Settings".
Some problems happened when trying to use Google Map. You can try to update the Google Play Service to resolve it.
Try to chat with your baby
Try to chat with your family members
Family members who are bound to the watch will be added to the chat automatically.
Are you sure to delete the chatting records?

The watch will not report the location voluntarily, only when APP is opened, there will be no school guard and electronic fence notice. The most power saving is the longest waiting time for the watch.
Reporting frequency is lower, electricity saving, school guarding and electronic fence function can not be promptly notified.
The best mode to enable all positioning functions of the watch.
After turning off, the message will not be reminded when you receive it.
Are you sure to delete the friend?
You can view all the SMS received from the watch
1.When the watch issues an SOS request, it will dial according to the priority of the following contacts. When a contact is answered successfully, the watch will end the dialing behavior.
2.Long press a contact to adjust its priority, right swipe to delete the contact.
Disabling the time period will reject all calls (including one-way calls).
Micro chat can be received but not reminded
The SOS feature will work properly.
The positioning function will work normally.
When the baby is resting also \n let the watch work for a day \n take a break~
A small gift, Can give the baby unlimited power
Control the contact of strangers with the baby \n Give the baby a safe environment
Please enter your password (16–20 digits or letters)
View the binding number of this watch
Binding failed, You are not licensed by this watch administrator
The avatar is set to empty
There is nothing here, open the collection of SMS messages \n You can view all the text messages received by this baby \'s watch.
Please enter the contact phone number
Please set the disabled time zone name
Here, your communication with \n your baby will be more at your heart.
Here, you will know \n the baby’s whereabouts, safe and secure.
You can agree on a goal \n with the baby and set a gift to \n let the baby have more growth momentum!
The task can only be completed once a day~
The photo request has been sent to the watch. Please be patient. If there is no response after %1$s s, please re-operate.
Please enter the name of kid\'s home
Please enter the name of kid\'s school
You haven\'t started collecting praise yet~
The watch is not activated. Please insert the SIM card into the watch to activate it.
Photo request failed to be sent
